alert.note: Alert for Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 8:17PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Sierra and northern Dona Ana Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 817 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Spaceport America. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Sierra and northern Dona Ana Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tularosa Basin; Northern Dona Ana County; Sierra County Lakes
